General.Name: Rianlon Corp
General.Description: Rianlon Corporation provides anti-aging additives and application technologies for polymer materials industry worldwide. It offers primary and secondary antioxidants, UV absorbers, hindered amine light stabilizers (HALS), and antioxidant U-pack, which is customized blending formulation to provide anti-aging solution. Rianlon Corporation was founded in 1994 and is headquartered in Tianjin, China.
